attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these times of financial turmoil, people who have to work through the countless number of agencies in the UK, due to the government run job centers not being able to provide actual work anymore. are being paid less than the people that they work alongside, while the agencies pocket the difference. This in my mind is slave labour. I want to be able to work for my money and spend it on running a home and raising a family. Not lining the pockets of some faceless agenccy
